sourcesContent: body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; background-color: #f0f0f0; } .container { text-align: center; } input[type="text"], input[type="password"], select, textarea, button { margin: 10px; padding: 10px; font-size: 16px; border-radius: 5px; border: 1px solid #ccc; width: 300px; max-width: 100%; } button { cursor: pointer; background-color: #007bff; color: #fff; border: none; } button:hover { background-color: #0056b3; } .error-msg { color: red; }
